form.question: Will the 3rd party request, process, transfer or store FT customer or FT staff debit/credit card data?

child_questions.question: Please ignore the other questions on this questionnaire.

form.question: Is the 3rd party currently PCI compliant?

child_questions.question: Please upload a PCI compliance certificate.
Please state your deadline to become compliant.

form.question: Is the 3rd party using their own supplier to process FT customer card data?

child_questions.question: Please state the name of the 3rd parties own supplier
Please upload a copy of their PCI compliance certificate

form.question: Will the 3rd party or their own supplier transfer FT customer debit/credit card data (by any means) outside the EU?

child_questions.question: Please list ALL the countries the 3rd party and ALL their suppliers will transfer the data to and describe the end to end security protecting the data in transit.
child_questions.prompt: Detail by individual supplier if relevant

form.question: Will the 3rd party or their own supplier store FT customer debit/credit card data?

child_questions.question: Please state in which countries the data will be stored and describe the security protecting the data?
child_questions.prompt: Include information relating to backups and or voice recordings. Detail by individual supplier if relevant.

form.question: Will any supplier of the 3rd party have access to the card systems for any other reason e.g., for hardware support?

child_questions.question: Please give the name and address of the organisation and list all the countries from which access can occur.

form.question: Will the 3rd party or their own supplier provide equipment (e.g., iPad, PC) via which a FT landing page will process card data?

child_questions.question: State what version and make of encryption is on the devices

form.question: Will the 3rd party be using or creating their own landing page through which FT customers will subscribe?
State what security is on the landing page?
Do you provide training and guidance to all relevant staff on PCI?

child_questions.question: Please confirm how many of your staff you have identified required training, and your current percentage for those already trained.

form.question: Has the 3rd party been prosecuted or investigated for PCI related offences?
Please detail if the PAN is hashed/obfuscated and to what degree on the 3rd parties systems and the 3rd parties supplier individually if applicable.
